@lets_experiment @elizabethiorns @eperlste @brianglanz @openscience @unidanbiology Thank you for having me too!!
@lets_experiment The story doesn't change, but the level of detail we use does.
@lets_experiment in balancing providing a realistic view of challenges associated with our work with sharing our passion
@lets_experiment The biggest challenge is taking complex science and distilling it into a good story.  Our campaign itself is an experiment
@oscarjask Err sorry I meant attack those targets on the HIV virus.
@oscarjask We believe that that HIV controllers have normal immune system machinery and their killer t-cells are preloaded w/ these targets.
@p212121 wow thank you very much!  Will do!
@lets_experiment To their immunity! #ScienceChat
@lets_experiment For our vaccine formulation.  We believe that these beneficial targets that controllers preferentially target are the key
@lets_experiment We are using beneficial targets on the surface of the virus that HIV controllers preferentially target as the basis
@lets_experiment Controllers are the ~1 in 300 people who are living with HIV who have a natural immunity to the virus. #ScienceChat
@l_aylesworth @p212121 Wow that is amazing!  Thank you very much for spreading the word about our campaign!
@p212121 We are feeling good.  We still have a ways to go but we are getting great support from everyone.  We are very lucky/thankful!
@p212121 Yes I do!  Very sorry we have been running hard!  We will get back to you this week!

Flying home early.  Rock!

It's 730 am and I'm with Paris and beach.
430 in vegas.  Great hang w Criss & JV.  Heading to hard rock to hang w Beach.
Sitting @ LAX.  Southwest bus to OAK.  Good times.

is in LA on Thurs and LV on Sat.  As long as I don't have to fly for 22 hours again, I'm happy!
Watchmen better be dope.  The hype around this thing is ridiculous
I can't feel my tongue :/
At the dentist :(
Starting the day off much earlier then normal... thanks to Dr. Fong.
Just now sleeping.  See you all in 3 hours :)
Wow, last time I checked the time it was 4 PM.  I've been working straight for almost 9 hours.  Time to eat something.
Woke up to a rainy sunday in the bay.  Bummer.  Was going to work outside today.
just ate the most delicious cookie ever from Teacake bake shop.  Coconut + chocolate + oatmeal == !!!!@#@$@#@!
wants a microchip embedded in his brain
is seriously jet lagged, and missing the blond
is already missing the blond :/
is at Frankfurt airport boarding a flight home.  Frankfurt -> SFO is a looooooooooong flight.  Especially when flying Lufthansa.
mission accomplished!
Its 2 AM in Almaty.. on Wednesday.  Time to sleep.
Leaving Almaty in 24 hours.  Going to miss the blond in a serious way. :(
Pancakes @ the Intercontinental, Almaty.  Definitely in the top 5 best pancakes I've had anywhere.  Crazy but true!
Sparkart just launched the new Slipknot site.  Check it @ Slipknot1.com.  Maggots rejoice!
just waking up in Kazakhstan.   Its 3 PM already in SF.  Nuts!
thinks the music business is analogous to the Russian nested doll he is looking at right now.
Just had a Kazakh snickers bar.  Tasted just like the American counterpart.  :)
There is a Apple "kiosk" at the "Mega mall" here in Almaty.  Did you know that the name Almaty comes from the Kazakh word for "Apple?"
Fermented mares milk is a delicacy in Kazakhstan.  Yes, you do learn something new every day, especially when you are in Almaty for a week.
Its 4:44 AM on Sunday in Almaty, and its snowing.  Going to check out the museum next door when it opens.
is in Almaty, Kazakhstan.  Wow.  Pictures coming soon on the Sparkart blog.
Helping the blond pack for Almaty.  Why are we going to this crazy place again?
is emailing back and forth with a client at 2 AM on a Saturday.  Sleep is def. over rated!
is not happy about flying Lufthansa :/.  At least last time they had connexion.
is working on something new with the amazingly talented Sparkart crew.  My crew is the s***!
Getting ready to go to Kazakhstan.  Has anyone been to Almaty??
Building something new...
Fantastic customer service @ Apple Store emeryville.  Those guys saved me a heck of a lot of pain and suffering.  THANK YOU!
all nighter in SF.  Working until I just can't work any more.  I have a few more hours left in me!
@jimmyrey Sorry just saw this.  Need to twitter more often!  Sure, drop me a line anytime.  Just call the Sparkart office and ask for me.
Erin is going to Kazakhstan in 4 weeks.  Bummer :(.  I never thought I would have any reason to go to Borat's home country.  Crazy!
Going to see the curious case of Benjamin button with blond.  Hope it's good!
Bummer.. VDream didn't win round 2 of Facebook Fund.  We still kick ass though!  Had a great time hanging with the Facebook team, and VCs.
Hanging with Lu at 4:28 AM.  I am officially nocturnal.
Thanksgiving is here.  Cherry pie is my favorite!
Launched the new site for The Killers.  Check it out www.thekillersmusic.com.  Super dope!
Back from vegas for the 5th time in 30 days.  Good times with the Blond at Bellagio!
On my way to LAX next later this morning.  Another beautiful day in LA with back to back meetings.
In Vegas for the 3rd time this month tom.  And I am there again on Friday for the Believe premiere.  Should I just get a place in Vegas??
Sunday brunch with the blond in 45 mins.  Can't wait!
Great time last night @ Slanted Door w/ the VDream crew.  Love that joint.
VDream is one of the 25 apps to get funded by Facebook Fund!  It's easier to get into Harvard then it is to get a FBFund grant.  GO VDREAM!
Longest day ever:  Woke up @ 1 AM PST, arrive @ OAK at 10:40 AM PST, @ Sparkart all day, taking the VDream team out @ 9 PM. Holy Cow!
On my way to Columbus now.  Flying home via MDY tomorrow at 6am est. Damn that's early!  I'll be up at the time I'm usually sleeping.
